Title: WPF Manga Reader
Description: This is quite simple WPF-based manga and comics reader, written in C#. It utilizes functionality of WPF to provide good user experience, in particular, reality-like page flipping.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is quite simple WPF-based manga and comics reader, written in C#. It utilizes functionality of WPF to provide good user experience, in particular, reality-like page flipping.

All credits for Book Control go to Mitsu.
.NET framework 3.0 is required to run Manga Reader.

Requirements for manga projects:
  • Folder structure must be as following:
    • <Manga title>
      • <Volume number>
      • <Volume number>
      • <Volume number> etc.
  • Each volume can have inside chapter subfolders, OR is can contain image files themselves.
  • JPEG, PNG and GIF are only supported.
  • When adding new manga project, adding cover image is NECESSARY.
